name: teams_detail
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool divanscore.
Tool description: The most powerful sports API for live scores and football scores, results and stats. And not just football – choose from more than 20+ sports, 5000+ leagues and tournaments, millions of events and many esports competitions. Analyze almost any live score and statistics on the planet ... This API helps to create a sporting site/application
API description: Fetch detailed information about a specific team using its team ID.

teamid.description: The value of id field returned in …/teams/search endpoint or …/matches/detail or …/tournaments/get-featured-events or …/tournaments/get-scheduled-events or …/tournaments/get-top-teams, etc…
